players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Bob is dead! We need to figure out who could have done this. Does anyone have any information that might help us identify the killer?"
Diana: "I agree with Alice, we need to find out who killed Bob. I have no information to share at the moment but I will keep an open mind and listen carefully to what everyone has to say."
Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding out who had the means and motive to kill Bob. Alice's shocking reaction seems suspicious to me."
